channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule Service Datatype Description Schedules can be created for select Storage services, such as iscsi. These schedules are used to perform various tasks such as scheduling snapshots or synchronizing replicants. Local active A flag which determines if a schedule is active. Type: integer createDate The date a schedule was created. Type: dateTime id A schedule's internal identifier. Type: integer
